summary: A drama from Czechoslovakian directors Karl Degl and Antonín Novotný about a man who builds a cathedral.
cast: Jakub Seifert|Rudolf Deyl|Karel Kolár|Eva Vrchlická|Jaroslav Hurt|Florentin Steinsberg|Karel Vána|Vladimír Srámek|Milada Zázvorková|Rudolf Deyl
director: Directors: Karl Degl (as Karel Degl), Antonín Novotný
title: Stavitel chrámu
